info.name: Event Subscription for Electronic Temperature Sensors
info.description:
## NOTE See the [Developer Guide](https://developer.zebra.com/content/data-reporting-electronic-temperature-sensors-developer-guide) for information on what is output in the webhook. ## Prerequisites You will need: 1. **Your `tenant`** is the same as your tenant account number. Visit the _**[Tenant Service API](https://developer.zebra.com/apis/review-savanna-tenant-service)**_ on the [Zebra Developer Portal](https://developer.zebra.com/) to retrieve your `tenant` if you don't already have it available.
**Examples**: - If you _**don't**_ have an organization account with Zebra your `tenant` should look like this `2e18f99ae1644282a7ead607afb7367d` - If you _**do**_ have an organizational account with Zebra your `tenant` should look similar to one of these two formats: + `75423` + `zebra`. 2. **A valid `Bearer token`** ***or*** a valid `API Key`. You can generate a `Bearer token` by sending your `client_id` and `client_secret` in a `GET` request to Zebra as in this example. ```json curl --location 'https://api.zebra.com/v2/oauth/token/access' \--header 'client_id: {{your clientId}}' \--header 'client_secret: {{your client secret}}' ```

header.description: REQUIRED: Your `tenant`. See the Tenant Service API at https://developer.zebra.com/apis/review-savanna-tenant-service)_ to get your `tenant`. If you do not have an organization account with Zebra your `tenant` should look like this `2e18f99ae1644282a7ead607afb7367d`. If you do have an organizational account with Zebra your `tenant` should look like one of these two: `75423` or `zebra`

variable.description: REQUIRED: Supply the `subscriptionId` of the webhook subscription you want to stop. Example: `B5JD07WPJ3BDVXRR`. You can retrieve all your `subscriptionId`(s) using `GET` `/subscription`.

header.description:
(Required) Your `tenant`. See the _[Tenant Service API](https://developer.zebra.com/apis/review-savanna-tenant-service)_ to get your `tenant`.

**Examples**: - If you _**don't**_ have an organization account with Zebra your `tenant` should look like this `2e18f99ae1644282a7ead607afb7367d` - If you _**do**_ have an organizational account with Zebra your `tenant` should look like one of these two:
- `75423` - `zebra`

variable.description:
(Required) Supply the `subscriptionId` of the webhook subscription you want to start. **Example:** `B5JD07WPJ3BDVXRR`

You can retrieve all your `subscriptionId`(s) using `GET` `/subscription` above.
